issue.title: [Rust] Move array related code into a separate module
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5721](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5721). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We should move all array related code into a separate module `array`, and re-export public interfaces.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5721?focusedCommentId=16873226) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
Issue resolved by pull request 4687
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4687>
